overview:
Prior to co-founding Beep, Raef gained 8 years product management, marketing and business development experience working in a variety of technology related companies both in Australia and Canada. This includes over 4 years working for famous3D managing the development of a number of mobile applications for the Japanese, Chinese and Australian markets.

While having a business background, Raef is a self taught developer having worked on various “side” projects over the years. These include numerous websites and mobile applications including, [19secret] (http://19secret.com) and [smsGeezer] (http://smsgeezer.com). He has recently developed [Quick.as] (http://quick.as) and [Recordle] (http://recordle.com).
